issue.title: DRC Vehicle can't make sharp turns

message.raw: Polaris trajectories generated from latest version of polaris_test branch.  Both forward and backwards motions were tested.  Forward motion last 2500 (ms) at max velocity and backwards 1500 (ms). All steering angles from -PI to PI are tested in both direction.  After performing a trajectory the breaks are applied for 2000 (ms) and then the steering wheel placed in the neutral position 0 radians.  After that the next trajectory is tested.
message.html: Polaris trajectories generated from latest version of polaris_test branch. Both forward and backwards motions were tested. Forward motion last 2500 (ms) at max velocity and backwards 1500 (ms). All steering angles from -PI to PI are tested in both direction. After performing a trajectory the breaks are applied for 2000 (ms) and then the steering wheel placed in the neutral position 0 radians. After that the next trajectory is tested.
